name: Flying Kuromaguro
description:
This game is a tribute to an artist called Koronba.

Tunas are flying everywhere and crashing down on everything. Protect your roof from tunas and collect some high scores. The control was made to play with one hand, so you can play the game while doing something else, like eating chips. This game is perfect for killing time.

Any score you get will be converted into points. These points can be used to unlock 7 more background music to spice up your gameplay.

This game is made for a portfolio to enter university, but I certainly put effort into it.
